testcase.name: test_checkin_at_office_auto_approved
testcase.failure: tests/test_enhanced_attendance.py:234: in test_checkin_at_office_auto_approved assert response.status_code == 200, f"Check-in failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Check-in failed: {"detail":"You have already checked in today"} E assert 400 == 200 E + where 400 = <Response [400]>.status_code
